title: The Kuibyshevsky Oil Refinery suspended operations after a UAV attack on March 23. One of the units was damaged. ASTRA source...
content: The Kuibyshevsky Oil Refinery suspended operations after a UAV attack on March 23. One of the units was damaged. ASTRA sources: As a result of the attack on the oil refinery in Samara, the AVT-4 unit was damaged and the plant's production cycle was stopped.
author: Live UA Map
